Detailed Description

PlmnProvider is the provider to retrieve data about plmns. An instance of this class is part of the the Apoxi Data Control. A pointer to this provider can be retrieved from the main provider via the id:

c_plmn_provider_id

Following column ids are defined: c_mnc_id :NumberType: returns the mobile network code. c_mcc_id :NumberType: returns the mobile country code. c_cc_id :NumberType: returns the ITU-T E.164 country code. c_country_shortname_id :WStringType: returns the countries short name. c_plmn_name_id :WStringType: returns the plmns name. c_plmn_shortname_id :WStringType: returns the plmns short name. c_networktype_id :NumberType: returns the networktype of the plmn (enumeration of NetType : Gsm900, Gsm1800, Gsm900_1800, Gsm1900, Gsm900_1900, Gsm1800_1900, Gsm900_1800_1900, ThirdGeneration)

NOTE: Please do not instantiate this class.
